entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
